phrases: That damn Sanada Yukimura dared to embarrass me!
I did not expect my plan to backfire.
Will you have me killed, Lord Ieyasu?
You must stop at nothing to capture Yukimura!
I doubt he is the type to come along quietly.
Sanada's party seems to be heading toward Omi.
He must intend to flee to Ishida Mitsunari's castle.
I will not let Sanada or the Kushimitama escape.
Why do not you tell us what you actually did?
Ieyasu really did not appreciate my performance.
That cannot possibly be the whole story.
If anyone comes after us, we will slaughter them.
They just will not give up.
I thought you would be coming back this way,
so I have been waiting for you.
I bet you set those traps for us, so you could laugh at us again.
Ben-chan, I am so happy to see you again.
Our pursuers must have heard that explosion.
I doubt we will be able to escape so easily.
We will hide in the forest up ahead.
You do not know what scout means, do you?
I cannot tell if they are on the same wavelength or not.
I do not mind the view, but you should cover up.
Saizo will be back before you know it.
We will return to Ueda soon.
What are we supposed to do?
I wonder if our lord will praise us.
If we continue on our path, we will end up at Lake Biwa.
They must intend to cut off our escape and kill us in one fell swoop.
We will not be able to swim.
You are as demanding as always.
As long as I have you, I know we will make do.
You came all the way here to thank me?
You fool, I am the one chasing you.
At least, I am pretending to be.
I am here to reclaim what you stole!
That is quite the accusation, Masamune.
Besides, you cannot handle this treasure.
I did not expect you to bring so many men.
but he was not too far off the mark.
I will not let you touch the old man or Isanami.
I will not go easy on you.
I did not expect you to make it this far.
Thanks to you, we have got more work to do.
I heard he is a stone cold killer.
You actually believe a guy hanging out with this bunch is a stone cold killer?
I do not know about this Iga Marici,
but it sounds like a load of crap!
Saizo, you are scared, are not you?
I cannot get enough of those eyes.
You are my one light in the darkness.
I am not an Iga ninja.
I am one of Sanada's warriors, Kirigakure Saizo.
There is only five of them!
I never expected much from these fools anyway.
It is time to end this, Sanada Yukimura.
They sure know how to show us a good time.
What are you bastards doing in my territory?
He is got the devil's own luck.
Yukimura-sama, I am glad you are all right.
It was not me, but this fellow.
Want To come live on my boat?
I will give you everything you want.
Who do you think you are talking to?
What a scrappy woman you are.
You are perfect for a pirate.
What makes you think I am a woman?
Jinpachi, you must not speak to Yukimura-sama that way.
I am Sanada Yukimura of Ueda.
Wine and women are my pleasure.
Live for fun is my motto!
You have got the right idea.
I only helped because you told me there were hot chicks,
but this hardly seems worth it.
How dare you be so impolite?
On this ship, my word's absolute.
Who has time for a flat-chested dog like you?
Where is the busty blonde you were talking about, Juzo?
You moron, we are on a boat.
You will follow my rules while you are on my ship.
He stopped Seikai's club with his bare hands.
Go take a nap, you musclebound kid.
You are way too weak to be getting violent on my ship.
Besides, I have not given these guys permission to ride.
Juzo, I know we have made a brothers' pact,
but I do not owe these clowns anything.
I will test you to see if you are worthy of riding on my ship.
What did you think it was?
Swords are not the only way to settle matters.
If you can down all of this, I will let you ride on my ship.
Look at how much is in there.
Cannot you see how wasted you will get?!
This is not the time for heroics.
I have never had anything other than the temple's sake.
This will be my first drink.
You do not know what you are getting into!
Why are you being such a square, Saizo?
I wonder how Yukimura-sama and the others are doing?
I hope he has not gotten himself into trouble with the women in the capital.
The mansion's been practically empty since Kamanosuke and Seikai left, too.
What are we going to do if something happens to them?
You are a strong one, are not you?
It is been a while since I have seen someone enjoy sake so much.
I could never stop drinking such good sake.
Why do not you have some more?
Why am I the only one drinking from a bowl?
Onii-chan, you will catch a cold if you sleep out here.
The sake's good, but I am hungry.
Miss, apparently this guy's not a cat, but a panther.
I have built up a tolerance against alcohol and poison.
But, Kakei-san, what are you doing on this boat?
You never came back to Ueda.
Do not tell me you have decided to become a pirate.
I traveled the country broadening my knowledge...
I heard a pirate named Nezu had some imported guns,
so I found my way onto his ship.
But, of course, he was not eager to part with his guns.
He challenged me to drink as well.
After the second barrel, he called me his brother.
I do not believe this guy.
He happily gave me a gun, though not for free, of course.
I have been working off my debt ever since.
And he is as rigid as always.
Well, you saved us because you happened to be on this boat.
Why were all those men chasing you, anyway?
You will have to ask Yukimura for the details.
There is a limit to how much I can do to protect him.
What are you guys talking about?
Saizo, what are you talking about?
You are acting like a woman, Kamanosuke.
Who do you guys think you are, treating me like a woman?
You are quite the aggressive drunk.
Is there something on my face?
Are you really the lord of Ueda?
You look like a common playboy and his friends to me.
You definitely do not seem like someone important.
Surrounded by all those men without any escape,
your only destinations were Hell or Heaven.
Who knows what I would have done?
You cannot tell me you were not thinking anything.
I had my warriors, so I knew it would work out.
Or else I expected to meet someone new.
Are you a genius or a moron?
Who are you to ask such a question?
You are always bound to someone by invisible lines on land.
As long as you are there, you belong to someone.
I do not belong to anyone.
On the wide open seas and under the endless sky, I am free.
I do not have to do crap like pay taxes or fight anyone's wars out here.
The pirate's life is best for drinking and having fun.
You do not like being tied down?
Those who are bound are bound wherever they go,
and those who are free are always free.
Whoever you serve and wherever you live,
if they are your own choices, you are free.
Your heart can never be bound.
What would a lord with servants know?
You pay them, do not you?
Unfortunately, I do not have much money.
I have got hardly any land either.
They are all here because they choose to be.
I think I have been looking for a place like this.
Is the pirate coming with us to Ueda?
When did you trick him, old man?
We are gathering more and more people.
The bond between men is an interesting thing.
First I met Saizo, and then everyone else in Ueda.
Let us go back to Ueda.
Tell me that busty blonde's going to be there this time.
You are a strange one, are not you?
Why are you going all the way to Ueda?
If I do not get to see the girl Juzo was talking about,
this will all have been a waste.
The busty blonde really does exist, right?
Did Kakei-san really call her a busty blonde?
Kakei-san, you may be serious, but that does not mean you are blind.
The next episode of Brave 10 is The True Face of Ice.
